raw.title: [TEMP CHECK] Add gmBTC on Arbitrum V3
raw.author: 0x08651EeE3b78254653062BA89035b8F8AdF924CE
raw.body:
---

**Title: [TEMP CHECK] Add gmBTC on Arbitrum V3
Author: @0xlide - @SaucyBlcok
Date: 2024-01-26**

---

## Summary
This publication presents the community an opportunity to add gmBTC to the Arbitrum Aave v3 Liquidity Pool.

## Motivation
GMX Protocol is the largest DEX offering derivatives and one of the most popular DeFi’s today. The introduction of several new features and integration with Chainlink Data Stream in GMX V2 has significantly reduced the risks of front-running and price manipulation compared to GMX V1. gmBTC is a BTC-USD's Liquidity Token on the GMX V2 and earn fees from leverage trading, borrowing fees and swaps. 

Integrating gmBTC as collateral asset in the Aave V3 Arbitrum Pool has the potential to create new demand for borrowable assets on Aave V3, such as WBTC and Stablecoin.

## Specifiction

Ticker: gmBTC
Contract Adress: [0x47c031236e19d024b42f8AE6780E44A573170703](https://arbiscan.io/token/0x47c031236e19d024b42f8AE6780E44A573170703)
Chainlink Oracle: [0x395D5c5D552Df670dc4B2B1cef0c4EABfFba492f](https://arbiscan.io/address/0x395d5c5d552df670dc4b2b1cef0c4eabffba492f)

Proposed risk parameters will be shared at the potential ARFC stage of this proposal.

## Reference
Project: [https://app.gmx.io/#/trade](https://app.gmx.io/#/trade)
GitHub: [https://github.com/gmx-io ](https://github.com/gmx-io)
Docs: [https://docs.gmx.io/docs/intro](https://docs.gmx.io/docs/intro)
Audit: [https://github.com/gmx-io/gmx-synthetics/tree/main/audits](https://github.com/gmx-io/gmx-synthetics/tree/main/audits)
Twitter: [https://twitter.com/GMX_IO?s=20 ](https://twitter.com/GMX_IO?s=20)
Discord: [https://discord.com/invite/H5PeQru3Aa](https://discord.com/invite/H5PeQru3Aa)

## Next Steps
1. Gather community feedback on this TEMP CHECK.
2. If consensus is reached, escalate this proposal to TEMP CHECK snapshot stage.
3. If TEMP CHECK snapshot outcome is YAE, escalate to ARFC stage.
4. If consensus on ARFC stage is reached and risk service providers provide feedback on risk parameters, escalate to ARFC snapshot stage.
5. If ARFC snapshot stage outcome is YAE, escalate to AIP stage

## Disclaimer
0xlide is not presenting this TEMP CHECK on behalf of any third party and is not compensated by any entity for creating this TEMP CHECK.

## Copyright
Copyright and related rights waived via [CC0](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/).

raw.title: [ARFC] Add sFRAX on Ethereum V3
raw.author: 0xe2D6AA050C655a3F0f95eFD8F2107778090308aE
raw.body:
Title: [ARFC] Add sFRAX on Ethereum V3

Author: @0xlide, @SaucyBlock and ACI (Aave Chan Initiative)

Date: 2024-01-18

# Summary
This publication presents the community an opportunity to add sFRAX to the Ethereum Aave V3 Liquidity Pool.

# Motivation
Staked FRAX (sFRAX) is an ERC-4626 staking vault that distributes a portion of the Frax Protocol yield. sFRAX APY attempts to roughly track the interest on reserve balances (IORB) rate of the United States Federal Reserve.

Integrating sFRAX as collateral asset in the Aave V3 Ethereum Pool has the potential to create new demand for borrowable assets on Aave V3, such as stablecoins and FXS.

# Specification

Ticker: sFRAX
Contract Adress: 0xA663B02CF0a4b149d2aD41910CB81e23e1c41c32
Chainlink Oracle: 0xB9E1E3A9feFf48998E45Fa90847ed4D467E8BcfD


| Parameter               | Recommendation |
|-------------------------|----------------|
| Isolation Mode          | NO             |
| Borrowable in Isolation | NO             |
| Stable Borrow           | NO             |
| Enable Borrow           | NO             |
| Enable Collateral       | YES            |
| Loan To Value           | 70.00%         |
| Liquidation Threshold   | 75.00%         |
| Liquidation Bonus       | 6.00%          |
| Reserve Factor          | 20.00%         |
| Liquidation Protocol Fee| 20.00%         |
| Supply Cap(sFRAX)       | 10.00M         |
| Borrow Cap(sFRAX)       | N/A            |
| Uoptimal                | N/A            |
| Base                    | N/A            |
| Slope1                  | N/A            |
| Slope2                  | N/A            |


# Next Steps
1. If consensus on ARFC stage is reached and risk service providers provide feedback on risk parameters, escalate to ARFC snapshot stage.
2. If ARFC snapshot stage outcome is YAE, escalate to AIP stage

# Disclaimer
ACI is not presenting this ARFC on behalf of any third party and are not compensated by any entity for creating this ARFC.

# Copyright
Copyright and related rights waived via CC0.

---

Title: [TEMP CHECK] Add sFRAX to Ethereum V3

Author: @0xlide - @SaucyBlock - Aave Chan Initiative

Created: 2023-12-14

---

# Summary

This publication presents the community an opportunity to add sFRAX to the Ethereum Aave V3 Liquidity Pool.

# Motivation

Staked FRAX (sFRAX) is an ERC-4626 staking vault that distributes a portion of the Frax Protocol yield. sFRAX APY attempts to roughly track the interest on reserve balances (IORB) rate of the United States Federal Reserve.

Integrating sFRAX as collateral asset in the Aave V3 Ethereum Pool has the potential to create new demand for borrowable assets on Aave V3, such as stablecoins and FXS.

# Specification

Ticker: sFRAX
Contract Adress: 0xA663B02CF0a4b149d2aD41910CB81e23e1c41c32
Chainlink Oracle: 0xB9E1E3A9feFf48998E45Fa90847ed4D467E8BcfD

Proposed risk parameters will be shared at the potential ARFC stage of this proposal.

# Next Steps:

1. Gather the AAVE community’s feedback on this proposal.
2. If consensus is reached, escalate this proposal to TEMP CHECK snapshot stage.
3. If TEMP CHECK snapshot outcome is yes, escalate to ARFC.
4. If consensus on ARFC is reached with appropriate technical details added, then escalate to ARFC snapshot.
5. If ARFC snapshot approved, then escalate to AIP Stage.

# Disclaimer

This TEMP CHECK is powered by ACI Skywards.
The Aave Chan Initiative has not received any form of compensation for creating this proposal.

# Copyright
Copyright and related rights waived via CC0 .

raw.title: [TEMP CHECK] Add EURC to Avalanche Aave V3
raw.author: 0x1855f41B8A86e701E33199DE7C25d3e3830698ba
raw.body:
Title: [TEMP CHECK] Add EURC to Avalanche Aave V3

Author: @0xkeyrock.eth

Date: 2023-11-22

--------

Summary
-
This TEMP CHECK proposes to add EURC on Avalanche V3. EURC is Circle’s EUR backed stablecoin.

Motivation
-
Circle is an established stablecoin issuer mainly known for USDC. EURC is their EUR based stablecoin and we believe it will be a great addition as it enables stablecoin diversity. EURC has also shown significant adoption and usage on Avalanche network with over $2M of liquidity on TraderJoe pool.
By onboarding EURC, we believe that the DeFi synergies created for users depositing or borrowing EURC on Aave will be a net positive for Aave and the Avalanche ecosystem.

Specification
-
Project: https://www.circle.com/en/
Documentation: https://www.circle.com/en/eurc
Avalanche Contract: 0xC891EB4cbdEFf6e073e859e987815Ed1505c2ACD
Chainlink oracle: EACAggregatorProxy | Address 0x3368310bC4AeE5D96486A73bae8E6b49FcDE62D3 | SnowTrace 2

**Risk Parameters**

Risk parameters can be defined by ChaosLabs and Gauntlet at the ARFC stage after TEMP CHECK reaches consensus.


Disclaimer
-
Keyrock is not presenting this Temp Check on behalf of any third party and is not compensated for creating this Temp Check. Keyrock holds EURC inventory as part of our liquidity provisioning operations.

Next Steps
-
1. If TEMP CHECK snapshot outcome is YAE, escalate to ARFC stage.
2. If consensus on ARFC stage is reached and risk service providers provide feedback on risk parameters, escalate to ARFC snapshot stage.
3. If ARFC snapshot stage outcome is YAE, escalate to AIP stage using the Skyward program from the ACI (@MarcZeller).

Copyright
-
Copyright and related rights waived via CC0.

cleaned.author: 0x57ab7ee15cE5ECacB1aB84EE42D5A9d0d8112922

raw.title: [TEMP CHECK] stEUR Onboarding on Aave V3 Ethereum Pool
raw.author: 0x57ab7ee15cE5ECacB1aB84EE42D5A9d0d8112922
raw.body:
---
title: [TEMP CHECK] stEUR Onboarding on Aave V3 Ethereum Pool
author: @marczeller - Aave-chan Initiative
date: 09-10-2023
---

## Summary

This TEMP CHECK proposes the onboarding of stEUR as a collateral-only asset on the Aave V3 Ethereum Pool. stEUR represents staked agEUR, a decentralized EUR-peg stablecoin minted by the Angle Protocol.

## Motivation

- **Decentralized Stablecoin Diversity**: At the ACI, we support the diversity of decentralized stablecoins. EUR stablecoins, in particular, are underrepresented in the ecosystem, and onboarding stEUR can help bridge this gap.
  
- **Growth in a Controlled Environment**: While stEUR and agEUR have relatively small market caps (5M$ and 20M$ respectively), onboarding stEUR as a collateral-only asset with limited caps will allow it to grow in a controlled environment, minimizing risks for the Aave protocol.

- **Collateral Potential**: stEUR, being a staked version of a decentralized EUR-peg stablecoin, presents a promising collateral candidate for Aave.

## Specification

- **Asset**: stEUR
- **Contract Address**: 0x004626A008B1aCdC4c74ab51644093b155e59A23

### Price Feed

For the price feed, we propose implementing a price adapter that calculates the value of stEUR based on the value of agEUR/USD and the exchange rate of agEUR/stEUR.

This replicates precedents such as with [sDAI](https://etherscan.io/address/0x29081f7aB5a644716EfcDC10D5c926c5fEe9F72B#code).

### Risk Parameters

We propose the following parameters for stEUR onboarding:

| Parameter             | Value       |
|-----------------------|-------------|
| Isolation Mode        | No          |
| Borrowable            | No          |
| Borrowable in Iso     | No          |
| Stable Borrowing      | No          |
| Collateral Enabled    | Yes         |
| Supply Cap (stEUR)    | 3,000,000   |
| Borrow Cap (stEUR)    | 0           |
| Debt Ceiling          | N/A         |
| LTV                   | 70%         |
| LT                    | 75%         |
| LB                    | 8%          |
| LPF                   | 10%         |
| Reserve Factor        | 20%         |
| Base Rate             | 0%          |
| Slope 1               | 8%          |
| Slope 2               | 80%         |
| Optimal Ratio         | 80%         |

## Next Steps

1. If TEMP CHECK snapshot outcome is YAE, escalate to ARFC stage.
4. If consensus on ARFC stage is reached and risk service providers provided feedback on risk parameters, escalate to ARFC snapshot stage.
5. If ARFC snapshot stage outcome is YAE, escalate to AIP stage.

## Disclaimer

The Aave-chan Initiative is not presenting this TEMP CHECK on behalf of any third party and is not compensated by Angle for creating this TEMP CHECK.

## Copyright

Copyright and related rights waived via CC0.

decision.summary: The proposal to add gmETH on Arbitrum V3 as collateral in the Aave V3 liquidity pool has received strong voting support with a stable and early lead for the 'YAE' option, indicating community favor. Forum sentiment is mixed but leans positive overall, highlighting confidence in GMX's security and liquidity. Similar past proposals to add new assets or update risk parameters consistently passed with 'YAE' and led to cautious market reactions, underscoring the importance of risk assessment. The recommendation is to approve the change to leverage new demand potential and diversify collateral options.
key_arguments_for: GMX Protocol is a leading DEX with reduced risks due to new features and Chainlink integration.
Adding gmETH can create new demand for borrowable assets such as ETH and stablecoins on Aave V3.
Voting timeline metrics show a consistent and early lead for 'YAE' with high stability.
Similar past proposals successfully passed with 'YAE' and transitioned to further stages.
key_arguments_against: Forum discussion includes some negative sentiment, reflecting concerns or caution from parts of the community.
Market impact post-vote was slightly negative in token price, indicating cautious reception.
Risk parameters for gmETH are yet to be finalized and shared in ARFC stage.

evidence.quote: First two comments: One negative expressing concerns, one positive highlighting GMX's robust security and deep liquidity.
Lead ratio total 1.0 for 'YAE', stability 1.0, early voting ratio 1.0 indicate strong, stable support.
Similar proposals to add sFRAX and update risk parameters passed with 'YAE' and had minor negative price impacts but were accepted.

decision.ai_final_conclusion: Option 'YAE' selected with stance to keep 'Change'.
decision.ai_final_reason:
- Timeline metrics indicate overwhelming and stable support for 'YAE' from early voting and across all quartiles.
- Forum sentiment is mixed but leans positive overall, supporting the proposal; thus, the recommendation mirrors community sentiment.
- Similar past proposals adding new assets or updating risk parameters passed with 'YAE', suggesting organizational readiness for such changes.
- Market and TVL impacts post-vote are modest and should not deter the positive long-term potential of expanding collateral options with gmETH.
